title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.96 - Other hazards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.96 - Other hazards

State Regulations
(a) Food vending machines requiring electrical power are to be grounded or double-insulated to protect anyone contacting or touching the machine from shock. (b) Food vending machines are to be constructed and installed so that they are stable and resist tipping under normal conditions of use and service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-5.96

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
